skillTree.name: Skeleton Chariot
skillTree.description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.

skillTree.name: Emerald Necroserpent
skillTree.description: Tougher than normal necroserpents, this Ramhotep's creation is a monstrous mount that shatters bones with every swipe of its tail and sink scimitar-sized fangs deep into soft flesh.

skillTree.name: Khemrian Warsphinx
skillTree.description: Giant leonine statues, almost impervious to harm; they wade through foes, crushing them like bothersome insects.

skillTree.name: Ceremonial Bandages
skillTree.description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.

skillTree.name: Trapped Soul
skillTree.description: Souls retrieved from the Netherwold and bound to their controller provide a degree of magical resistance.

skillTree.name: Frantic Fervour
skillTree.description: With his army of walking statues, Ramhotep intends to pull down the cities of those who defiled his work, slay the inhabitants of these uncultured civilisations, and construct his greatest monument to date: a vast mausoleum built from the bones of his foes.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Construct units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.description: Entities cannot die while ability is active
Unit is invulnerable to damage (does not apply to summoned units)

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Wrath of the Greatest"
	(replaces: "Wrath of the Creator")

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.name: Relentless Builder
skillTree.description: His craftsmanship was second to none, and it is said that his statues in the Valley of Kings were so lifelike that it is said that the kings of Nehekhara believed the gods themselves had returned to the mortal world.

effects.description: Construction cost: -30% for Income, Growth, Public Order and Landmark buildings
Construction time: -50% for Income, Growth, Public Order and Landmark buildings

skillTree.name: Tricked by Ramhotep
skillTree.description: In ancient Nehekhara, the finest artisans were commissioned to build grand burial tombs and upon completion they were expected to commit ritual suicide. Ramhotep was aghast at the thought, for it would deny the world of the beautiful creations he had yet to make. Thus, Ramhotep would manipulate the more arrogant Necrotects of the age to take his place.

effects.description:
Leadership: -15 for Necrotect heroes
	(Heroes in local province)

skillTree.name: The Visionary
skillTree.description: Ramhotep the Visionary was perhaps the greatest Necrotect in history. His craftsmanship was second to none, and it is said that his statues in the Valley of Kings were so lifelike that the Priest Kings of Nehekhara believed the gods themselves had returned to the mortal world.

effects.description:
Weapon damage: +10% for all Construct units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10% for all Construct units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ramhotep's Revenge
skillTree.description: Upon awakening from his death sleep, Ramhotep was horrified, and he set about excavating and restoring his marvels at once. Ramhotep's skill in undeath is as skilled as it was in life, and the statues that receive his attention are restored to their former majesty, striding into battle as if they were carved only yesterday.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +8% for Construct units
	(Hero's army)
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Inscription of Repair
skillTree.description: This intricate hieroglyphic engraving aids the Necrotect's drive to restore his Tomb King's monuments to their former glory.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +8% for Construct units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Emerald Sentinels of Lybaras
skillTree.description: "They stand staring into the sun for enternity, the physical embodiedment of the everlasting gods. Terrible ye who looked into their divine forms! "

effects.description: Grants the Emerald Sentinels of Lybaras follower to your faction

skillTree.name: Underworld Deathwatch
skillTree.description: "Beware the guardians of the Underworld who stalk among us!"

effects.description: Grants the Underworld Deathwatch follower to your faction

skillTree.name: Those That Stalk Beneath the Sand
skillTree.description: When the trap is sprung, several horrifying, snake-like forms burst from the ground to surround their prey. The Sepulchral Stalkers impale their foes on ornate staves before they even realize they are under attack.

effects.description: Grants the Those That Stalk Beneath the Sand follower to your faction

skillTree.name: Knights of Asaph's Temple
skillTree.description: Powerful, elite warriors who ride atop giant snake-shaped statues given to them as a reward for their prowess and utter dedication to their sovereign lord.

effects.description: Grants the Knights of Asaph's Temple follower to your faction

skillTree.name: The Skull Guardians
skillTree.description: "That which was stone, arise! Bone and bronze and leather and tar, creature of power awake and visit destruction on the enemies of Khemri!"

effects.description: Grants the The Skull Guardians follower to your faction

skillTree.name: Master Builder
skillTree.description: The master of the necrotectural art understands all aspects of the construction process; inspiration, labour, time and cost are all within his Undead grasp.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Master Hierotitan Sculptor
skillTree.description: No expense was spared in sculpting a Hierotitan - the greatest and most talented of Necrotects were contracted to work on the blessed stone that would form these gigantic statues.

skillTree.name: Master Necrosphinx Sculptor
skillTree.description: To carve a Necrosphinx is to manifest the greatest and most destructive creature of the underworld. Not all Necrotects were adept at bringing such constructions to Unlife - only the most gifted of their trade even dare.

skillTree.name: Master Warsphinx Sculptor
skillTree.description: The leonine statues, known as Warsphinxes, were first constructed in Khemri; and so it is Necrotects who hail from the first city are the greatest carvers of these magnificent and deadly stone beasts.

skillTree.name: Indomitable Will
skillTree.description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.

skillTree.name: Conqueror
skillTree.description: Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, its not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Tombstrike
skillTree.description: He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Over My Dead Body
skillTree.description: Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.

skillTree.name: Desertstrike
skillTree.description: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Canopic Jar Hoarder
skillTree.description: These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

backgroundSkills.name: The Greatest Necrotect
backgroundSkills.description: Ramhotep the Visionary has designed the Grand Necropolis of Resetra, the Monuments of Eternal Death in Zandri, the Monoliths of the Great Plains and many other architectural wonders. He is perhaps the greatest Necrotect in history.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for all Construct units
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +10 for all Construct units
	(Hero's army)
